channel.title: personal on Tobias Weiss
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Tobias Weiss

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Tobias. I like to play my guitar(s). When the weather is good I go jogging, biking or do other outdoor activities. When the weather is bad, I work out at home (or at the gym - if it is open). I was raised in a small village in south-east Germany. My mother tongue is Swabian, however I am also pretty familiar with German and English. Swedish and French also works to some extend.
